code: export function fetchLogin(username){return fetch('/api/session',{method:'POST',headers:{'content-type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({username:username})}).catch(function(err){return Promise.reject({error:'network-error'});}).then(function(response){if(!response.ok){return response.json().then(function(err){return Promise.reject(err);});}return response.json();});}export function fetchMenu(){return fetch('/api/cart',{method:'GET',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}}).then(function(response){if(!response.ok){throw new Error(response.status);}return response.json();}).catch(function(error){console.error(error);});}export function fetchLogout(){return fetch('/api/session',{method:'DELETE'}).catch(function(err){return Promise.reject({error:'network-error'});}).then(function(response){if(!response.ok){return response.json().then(function(err){return Promise.reject(err);});}return response.json();});}
